description: Sample SEO blog post briefs generated by the Restaurant Wrap pipeline

sourceContent.title: Toast POS Announces New Kitchen Display System Features for 2026
sourceContent.excerpt: Toast has unveiled significant updates to its Kitchen Display System, including AI-powered ticket routing, multi-language support, and enhanced expo station management designed to reduce kitchen chaos during peak hours.

longTailKeywords: how to set up toast kitchen display system
toast kds best practices for busy restaurants
seo.metaTitle: Toast KDS 2026 Features: Complete Setup Guide | R&G Consulting
seo.metaDescription: Discover Toast's new Kitchen Display System features for 2026. Learn how AI-powered ticket routing and expo management can transform your restaurant kitchen. Expert setup help available.

structure.headline: Toast Kitchen Display System 2026: Everything You Need to Know
subheadlines: Implementation Best Practices from the Field

keyPoints: AI-powered ticket routing reduces average ticket time by 23%
Multi-language support now available for 12 languages
New expo station view provides real-time order tracking
Integration with third-party delivery apps improved
Color-coded priority system for rush orders
summary.expertAngle: R&G Consulting has implemented the new KDS features in 15+ Cape Cod restaurants. We've seen firsthand how proper configuration dramatically improves kitchen flow during summer tourist season.
summary.uniqueValue: Real-world implementation experience from high-volume seasonal restaurants, plus configuration templates that work immediately.
summary.targetAudience: Restaurant owners and kitchen managers currently using Toast or considering a POS upgrade, especially those struggling with kitchen efficiency during peak hours.

sourceContent.title: Switching from Square to Toast: What Restaurant Owners Need to Know
sourceContent.excerpt: I've been using Square for 3 years and I'm seriously considering Toast. Can anyone share their experience with the migration? What about all my historical data? Main concerns are online ordering integration and the learning curve for my staff.

longTailKeywords: how to switch from square to toast pos
square to toast data migration guide
is toast better than square for restaurants
seo.metaTitle: Square to Toast Migration Guide: Complete Switching Checklist | R&G
seo.metaDescription: Thinking about switching from Square to Toast POS? Get our complete migration guide covering data transfer, staff training, and online ordering setup. Free consultation available.

structure.headline: The Complete Guide to Switching from Square to Toast POS
subheadlines: Why Restaurants Are Making the Switch
What Happens to Your Historical Data
suggestedSections: Quick Comparison Table: Square vs Toast
Data Migration: What Transfers and What Doesn't

keyPoints: Toast offers superior restaurant-specific features vs Square's general retail focus
Historical sales data can be exported from Square but requires manual formatting
Online ordering integration is smoother with Toast's native solution
Average staff training time: 2-3 hours for basic operations
Typical migration takes 2-4 weeks with proper planning
summary.expertAngle: R&G Consulting has helped 20+ restaurants migrate from Square to Toast. We've developed a proven migration checklist that minimizes downtime and data loss.
summary.uniqueValue: Real migration experience with data preservation strategies, plus staff training materials that reduce the learning curve by 50%.
summary.targetAudience: Restaurant owners currently using Square who are frustrated with limitations, considering expansion, or need better online ordering integration.

sourceContent.title: DoorDash Commission Changes 2026: How Restaurants Can Protect Their Margins
sourceContent.excerpt: DoorDash is rolling out updated commission structures in Q2 2026, with tiered rates based on marketing participation. Restaurants using integrated POS systems may qualify for reduced rates, making proper setup more critical than ever.

longTailKeywords: how to reduce doordash commission with toast
seo.metaTitle: Toast DoorDash Integration: Reduce 2026 Commission Fees | R&G
seo.metaDescription: Learn how proper Toast-DoorDash integration can reduce your commission fees in 2026. Step-by-step setup guide plus margin protection strategies for restaurants.

structure.headline: How to Reduce DoorDash Commissions with Toast Integration in 2026
subheadlines: How Toast Integration Qualifies You for Lower Rates
suggestedSections: Why Integrated POS Systems Get Better Rates
Setup Guide: Connecting Toast to DoorDash

keyPoints: DoorDash tiered commissions: 15%, 20%, or 25% based on marketing participation
Integrated POS users may qualify for 2-3% commission reduction
Toast's direct integration eliminates tablet-based order errors
Proper menu pricing for delivery can recover 5-8% of margin
Toast reporting shows true delivery profitability by item
summary.expertAngle: R&G Consulting specializes in delivery integration optimization. We've helped restaurants increase delivery profit margins by an average of 12% through proper Toast configuration.
summary.uniqueValue: Delivery margin calculator template plus proven menu pricing strategies for third-party delivery profitability.
summary.targetAudience: Restaurant owners using or considering DoorDash who want to maximize delivery profitability while minimizing commission fees.
